High-quality hard paper magnetic book-shaped gift box packaging, exquisite bronzing silver blessing, whether it is for friends or your own collection is the best choice. 2: Our coffee body is a detachable, ABS lightweight portable coffee body, you can take hand-ground coffee to any place, whether it is camping, traveling, hiking, cycling, or traveling around the world. The top of our hand grinder coffee machine is designed with a transparent cover, you can see the process of grinding and breaking the beans into powder, and you can easily observe the capacity of the remaining beans. 3: Built-in double bearings, fixed bearings reduce movement deviation, increase user comfort and improve grinding accuracy. 420 stainless steel burrs cut by 5-axis CNC equipment, sharp blades, precise gears, and efficient grinding of coffee beans. The key stainless steel grinding core helps you quickly and easily turn whole beans into fine coffee powder. We have designed a digital point adjustment nut to meet your love and pursuit of coffee. Whether it is American coffee, hand-brewed coffee, French press, espresso, latte, or cappuccino. 5: Precautions, please do so because our coffee machine uses closely matched bearings not wash it with water.
